name: Brainwave Cafe
address: 94/732 Harris St, Ultimo, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Vegan, Thai, Fast food, Asian, Fusion, Australian, Breakfast
description: Crafting food with Asian influences juxtaposed with modern Australian. Features dishes like burgers like 'pulled pork' and 'fissh burgers' all topped with relish and sauces; stir fries and salads; additional options like deep-fried mushrooms and tofu salads served with vegan dressing; mango chia pudding and creme brulee with coconut sorbet for dessert. Beverages are coffee, cold brew coffee, cold press juices, and organic teas. Fully vegan since August 2020.

name: Bodhi in the Park
address: 4 College St, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Vegan, Chinese, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Asian
description: Finer dining set amongst Hyde Park by St Mary's Cathedral. Serves yum cha at lunch with dishes coming out regularly from the kitchen during peak time. Asian style meals at dinner. No garlic or onion used. Fully vegan, including alcohol, since Jun 2019. Instagram @bodhirestaurantbar.

name: Bodhi Restaurant Bar
address: 2-4 College St, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Vegan, Asian
description: An all-vegan Asian restaurant/bar located in the middle of the City.

name: Iku Wholefoods Kitchen - Martin Place
address: MLC Centre Food Court, Martin Place (at Pitt St), Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Vegan, Macrobiotic, Fast food, Take-out
description: Ready made meals for dine-in or takeaway.

name: Joe's Sandwich Bar
address: 292 Kent St, Sydney CBD, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Vegan, Western, Fast food, Take-out
description: Vegan sandwich bar opened 2017. Serves coffee, treats, and sandwiches with different fillings such as tempeh reuben, miso eggplant, mock salmon, and greens. No telephone - contact via social media. Instagram @joessandwichbar.

name: Sanga
address: 5/655 King St, St Peters, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Vegan, American, Fast food, Take-out, Bakery
description: Vegan subway style bar. A project of Bhavani Baumann who co-founded Australia’s first vegan pub bistro - The Green Lion, in 2016. Offers freshly baked hot rolls with fillings and sauces to build own. Has a pie range, gluten free rolls and salad bowls on the menu too. Sweets include a range of house-made soft style cookies, cheesecake cups and lamingtons. Also has a range of beers, wines and cocktails. Open since Nov '21.

name: Voodie Burger
address: Broadway Shopping Centre, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Vegan, American, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Fusion, Australian
description: Kiosk 230 inside Broadway Shopping Centre serving fully vegan burgers in fusion flavors. Est. 2020. May get delivery via ubereats.

name: Alibi
address: 6 Cowper Wharf Roadway, Woolloomooloo, Sydney, New South Wales
open_hours: Now Open:                     Mon-Wed 4:00pm-9:00pm, Thu-Fri 6:00pm-12:00am, Sat 12:00pm-12:00am, Sun 3:00pm-11:30pm
cuisine: Cuisine: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Raw, Western, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Fusion, Australian
description: A Matthew Kenney restaurant & bar, est. 2018 inside Ovolo Hotel. Offers gourmet plant-based cuisine that's mostly vegan except for dairy cheese and milk options and non-vegan alcohol. Instagram @alibisydney. Confirmed open May 2020.

name: Flyover Fritterie & Chai Bar
address: 1 Temperance Lane, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Indian, Fast food, Take-out, Fusion, Gluten-free
description: Fritterie and chai bar est. 2019 in the laneway next to 389 George St, near the train stations Wynyard and Town Hall. Serves chickpea flour & vegetable pakoras (fritters), street style salads, quinoa khichri, pao burgers, and Indian chai (tea). Order at the window, and have your meal at one of the benches in the laneway. No longer fully vegan as of Oct 2021.

name: Health Nuts Shop & Cafe
address: Shop TG04 82-94 Darlinghurst Rd, Kings Cross Centre, Potts Point, Sydney, New South Wales
open_hours: Now Open:                     Mon-Thu 7:00am-9:00pm, Fri 7:00am-8:00pm, Sat 8:00am-9:00pm, Sun 8:00am-6:00pm
cuisine: Cuisine: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Organic, Raw, Western, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Gluten-free, Australian
description: Organic cafe within the health food store where most of the dishes are vegan and gluten-free. Offers prepared salads bar and dishes like vegan cheeseburger, carrot dog, pulled ‘vork’ sliders, vegan egg, and quiche. Has cabinet selection of vegan cakes and raw desserts. Fresh juices, protein smoothies, and espresso drinks available.

name: Joy Veg Fruit Dining
address: 790 Canterbury Rd, Belmore, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Vegan-friendly, International, Western
description: Finer vegetarian dining restaurant. Uses veggies and fruits. Limited seating, so book ahead. Enter on Allegra Ave.

name: Mother Chu's Vegetarian Kitchen
address: 367 Pitt Street, CBD, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Vegan-friendly, Chinese, Japanese, Asian, Taiwanese, Honey
description: One of handful of Asian vegetarian restaurants in Sydney. All vegan except honey.

name: Mr Percy
address: 139 Murray St, Pyramont, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Beer/Wine, European
description: Vegetarian wine bar and restaurant within the historic heart of Pyrmont.

name: Ojas Ayurvedic
address: 528 King St, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Catering, Gluten-free
description: Ayurvedic vegetarian cuisine restaurant opened 2021. Offers menu with 6 all-day menu dishes, 5 sattvic bowls, and evening thali platter with vegan options for all meals. Drinks are masala chai and moon milks with dairy or oat milk. Slices for dessert.

name: Orchard Street
address: Shop 2, 2-16 Glenmore Rd, Paddington, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Take-out, Australian
description: Juice and elixir bar offering smoothies, juices, raw dessert, and kombucha on tap plus prepared raw salads. Vegan except for bee pollen. Multiple locations, this one est. 2015.

name: Peace Harmony
address: 29 King St, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Vegan-friendly, Thai, Take-out
description: Small cafe serving veggie Thai food. Everything is vegan except for vitamilk (Thai) soy milk drink. Confirmed open December 2021.

name: Yellow
address: 57 Macleay St, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Take-out, European, French, Australian
description: Upscale vegetarian dining restaurant and bar. A la carte and tasting menus. Focus is on heirloom varietals grown by local suppliers. Note: Vegan options may be quite limited. Confirmed open May 2020.

name: An Viet
address: Shop 5, 185 Broadway, Ultimo, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Asian, Vietnamese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Vietnamese place right outside Broadway bus stop that has a vegetarian and vegan menu. Includes pho, vermicelli salad and veg rice paper rolls.

name: Arthur's Pizza
address: 260 Oxford St, Paddington, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Pizzeria with vegan pizzas on the menu.

name: Assembly Bar and Restaurant
address: 488 Kent St, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Bar and Italian restaurant on two floors. Menu has a couple of vegan pizzas listed plus the option to use vegan cheese on the vegetarian pizzas. Frequented by a younger crowd.

name: Audley Dancehall & Cafe
address: 2 Lady Carrington Drive, Royal National Park, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Ovo, Honey, Australian, Breakfast, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Offers vegan dishes marked on the menu. Includes a vegan big breakfast, smashed avocado, hash browns, vegan burger and 5 grain porridge.

name: Bare Naked Bowls
address: 145 Macpherson St, Bronte, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Organic, Raw, Take-out, Gluten-free, Honey, Breakfast, Non-veg
description: Small chain of stores offering vegan items including smoothies, acai bowls, toasts and rice bowls. Also has a selection of plant milks for coffee tonics and tea.

name: Beirut Falafel
address: 254 Abercrombie St, Darlington, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Pizza, Mediterranean, Fast food, Juice bar, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Veg choices include falafel and cauliflower wraps, salads, fruit, juice.

name: Bentley Restaurant and Bar
address: 27 O'Connell St, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Ovo, Western, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Upscale dining and bar. Regular menu is very meat-focused but reported offering a separate 8-course vegan menu with matching vegan wine. Call ahead to see if a reservation is necessary.

name: Betty's Burgers
address: Shop E-04, International Convention Centre, 14 Darling Dr, Sydney, New South Wales
open_hours: Now Open:                     Mon-Wed 11:30am-8:30pm, Thu 11:30am-9:00pm, Fri-Sat 11:30am-9:30pm, Sun 11:30am-8:30pm
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Ovo, American, Fast food, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Offers a vegan burger labelled on the menu with crispy fried brown rice and vegetable patty, tomato, lettuce, pickles, onion and spicy mayo.

name: Brooklyn Crispy
address: 2 Springfield Ave, Potts Point, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Pizza, Italian, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Pizzeria where the menu includes a vegetarian/vegan section. Dog-friendly space.

name: Cafe 10
address: UTS Building 10, Jones St, Ultimo, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Ovo, Fast food, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Casual cafe with counter service in a university building. Vegan versions of noodle soups/bowls are advertised including pho and tom yum. Vegan premade option is the tofu rice paper rolls. Has a sandwich bar.

name: Vim and Tonic
address: 143 King St, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Raw, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Little cafe inside a health food shop with raw-organic carrot cake, vegan wraps, salads, muffins (vary), smoothies, and non dairy milk for drinks (oat, coconut, soy, almond, rice). Has raw cocoa bliss balls.

name: VN Fresh
address: 3-7 Murray Rose Ave, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Vietnamese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Vietnamese food menu, limited but has a few choices.

name: Yatai Ozeki
address: Macquarie Centre, Food Court, Level 2 Upper (at Corner Of Herring Road And Waterloo Road), Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Japanese, Take-out, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Japanese restaurant located in food court of Macquarie Centre serving a large selection of rice/udon bowls. The veg options all include 'soy-bean mince'. They also have a range of salads with one veg option included. Curry is not vegan.

name: Zaaffran
address: 10 Darling Dr, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Ovo, Indian, Asian, Gluten-free, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Offers a variety of Indian dishes with both a vegetarian and vegan section for entrees and mains. Offers vegan sides and also and a majority of dishes are gluten free.

name: Zeus Street Greek - Australia Square
address: Shop 404/264 George St, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Mediterranean, Take-out, Greek, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Restaurant chain operating across Australia offering Greek street food since 2014. A separate vegan menu lists the following: sharing plate, a spartan box, baked falafel, pita, smoked eggplant dip, salads, and dessert loukoumi.

name: Zeus Street Greek - Pitt St
address: 5011/188 Pitt St, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Mediterranean, Take-out, Greek, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Restaurant chain operating across Australia offering Greek street food since 2014. A separate vegan menu lists the following: sharing plate, a spartan box, baked falafel, pita, smoked eggplant dip, salads, and dessert loukoumi.

name: Zeus Street Greek - Westfield
address: Westfield Sydney, Shop 5011, Level 5/188 Pitt St, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Mediterranean, Take-out, Greek, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Restaurant chain operating across Australia offering Greek street food since 2014. A separate vegan menu lists the following: sharing plate, a spartan box, baked falafel, pita, smoked eggplant dip, salads, and dessert loukoumi.

name: Gigi's Eco Collection
address: Sydney area, Sydney, New South Wales
description: An Australian brand for biodegradable glitter made up of only five ingredients that are vegan, non-toxic and cruelty free. Visit webpage for the online shop.

name: Candy Queens
address: Alexandria area, Sydney, New South Wales
description: All-vegan online candy shop selling mega pick'n'mix bags, gummy lollies, chocolates and sweets.

name: EZ VE - Market Stall
address: Sydney area, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Vegan fast food stall appearing at markets and events. Menu offers cheezeburgers, hot chips, chixburgers, popcorn cauliflower, and nuggetz.

name: Garden of Vegan
address: Sydney area, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Vegan meal delivery service with branches around Australia. Offers organic, oil free, and gluten free savory meals as well as sweets. See website for menu.

name: Green Wise Monkeys
address: Sydney area, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Delivery of plant-based platters & organic fruit to workplaces and homes, previously catering and pop-up. Mission to accelerate the world's transition to sustainable food.

name: Hammerhead Threads
address: Sydney area, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Sells online and at area markets - check webpage. Specializes in cruelty-free fashion: shoes, clothing, and accessories. Contact: info@hammerheadthreads.com

name: Jessy & Co
address: Sydney area, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Vegan caterer and market vendor - check facebook for market schedule. Offers pancakes and coffee.

name: Just Add Vegan
address: 13 / 25 Hoskins Ave (at Chapel Rd), Sydney, New South Wales
description: Vegan delivery service offering ready to eat meals, meal kits, vegan meat & cheese alternatives, pantry goods and sweet treats.

name: Lasagne for Breakfast
address: Greater Sydney, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Delivery of traditional Italian dishes made vegan, including pasta, platters, sauces, and more. Uses eco-friendly, sustainable packaging. Contact via Facebook.

name: Love Sweet Vegan
address: Ramsgate Foodies, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Vegan stall offering all gluten free and vegan baked goods such as mini cakes, pastries, and more. The stall is a regular at Turra Produce Market (Wednesday) and Ramsgate Foodie Market (Saturday). Check Instagram for location updates. Also delivers to Buddha Bowl Cafe.

name: M Dreams
address: 188 Pitt St, Westfield Sydney Central Plaza, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Shoe store selling Brazilian-made high end PVC (jelly) Melissa brand shoes which are vegan. Claim to be durable, environmentally friendly, recyclable, and responsibly produced. Some shoes are collaborations with known designers.

name: Mylk & Bun
address: Entertainment Quarter, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Stall offering vegan cinnamon buns at the Sydney Vegan Markets. 50% of profits go towards a community based refuge for women in crisis.

name: Pana Chocolate
address: Sydney area, Sydney, New South Wales
description: A 100% raw/vegan/organic chocolatier with an online store offering made-in-house treats. Free from dairy, soy, gluten and refined sugar. No longer has a storefront as of 2020 but products can be ordered online as well as in local shops/supermarkets.

name: Pressed and Squeezed
address: Sydney Area, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Market vendor specialising in waffles and lemonade. Regularly trading from the Sydney Vegan Market. Check Facebook for updates.

name: Revel Foods
address: Sydney area, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Mobile vegan food vendor appearing at local markets - check facebook for locations and updates. Offers dishes like rigatoni bolognese and cajun fusilli.

name: Seeds to Feeds
address: Syndey area, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Delivery of plant-based frozen meals also offering catering for NSW, QLD, VIC & ACT and event catering for Sydney.

name: Soulara
address: Sydney area, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Vegan meal service delivering nationwide. The majority of meal are gluten-free and nutrient dense. Dishes include gnocchi, curry, aloo gobi, mushroom bourguignon, kung pao, and pesto pasta.

name: SoulServe
address: Bondi Beach Market, Sydney, New South Wales
description: An all-vegan home-made ice cream market stall. Example of flavors: Lemon & macadamia, peanut butter, hazelnut roast, dark choc&sea salt, strawberry coconut, and matcha. As of March 2021, they can be found in Bondi Beach Market every Sunday. They also cater to private events. Check their Instagram account to keep updated.

name: Southern Soul
address: 114 Terry St, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Vegan soul food vendor appearing at various local markets, events, and festivals - check its webpage for schedule. Menu includes pulled jackfruit bbq, mac n cheese, deep fried cauliflower, cornbread, dumplings and jambalaya. Delivery and pick-up available.

name: The Plant Kitchen Co
address: Sydney area, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Plant-based and plastic-free packaging home delivery service. Delivery typically is a couple of days after you order. Prepares hand-made, home-style dinners in their kitchen and are ready-to-heat when they get to you. Delivery is free!

name: Small Bar
address: 48 Erskine St, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Western, Fast food, Take-out, Mexican, Australian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Vegans could have cauliflower wings, black bean tacos, fries, waffle fries, guacamole with corn chips plus monthly specials. NOTE: please confirm whether separate equipment/utensils are used to prepare vegan dishes.

name: Soma
address: 646 Harris St, Shop 2, Ultimo, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Take-out, Breakfast, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Coffee roaster operating a cafe located on the fringe of the Sydney CBD. Offers a small food menu and a separate vegetarian/vegan menu. Breakfast for vegans include granola with almond milk and coconut yogurt, chia pudding, green smoothies, sourdough toast with sides, and a shakshouka (also for lunch). Almond milk and coconut yogurt made-in-house. Previously named Mecca Ultimo.

name: Soul Origin
address: 2-10 Darling Dr, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Mediterranean, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out, Australian, Breakfast, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Deli style restaurant chain operating across Australia. Offers a variety of ready-to-eat foods including sandwiches and prepared salads. The following salads are vegan and marked as plant-based: falafel, brown rice, green bean avocado, green lentil, mexi bean, and pumpkin couscous. Vegan dressings include zesty balsamic and zesty lemon olive oil. Check with staff to see what else is or can be vegan. Serves coffee and smoothies.

address: Shop 25A Lower Ground, Central Plaza, 450 George St, Sydney, New South Wales

name: Sumo Salad
address: Shop RG15, Ground Floor, The Galeries, 500 George St, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Mediterranean, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Australian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Offers many vegan choices including around 5 fresh different vegan salads daily. Option to build your own salad. Includes pumpkin, couscous, green veggies, broccoli, beans, quinoa and more. Also has hummus and falafel lunch. Also has cold pressed juices and coffees with almond milk. Has multiple branches, this one is on the ground floor of the Galleries.

name: Sushi Hub
address: Shop 10.24 World Square Shopping Centre, 644 George St, Sydney, New South Wales
open_hours: Now Open:                     Mon-Fri 8:00am-7:00pm, Sat-Sun 8:00am-5:00pm                  Closing soon.
cuisine: Cuisine: Ovo, Japanese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Sushi eatery located in the World Square Shopping Centre. Vegan options include tofu teriyaki, avocado roll, vegetable tempura nigiri, plain inari, and vegetable tempura inari.

name: SYD - SumoSalad - T1
address: Sydney Airport, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Raw, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Australian, Breakfast, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Quick service salad franchise. Offers pre-designed menu items or build your own salad. Vegans could also get raisin toast, fruit salad, and cold pressed juices. Labels which dishes are vegan and cater for a range of dietary requirements. Located near Gate 24 after security.

name: Thai Rock
address: 28 Bayswater Rd, Potts Point, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Ovo, Thai, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Asian, Gluten-free, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Has vegan menu list offering dishes like salt & pepper tofu, rice paper rolls, tom yum, papaya salad, pad thai, and a few kinds of curries plus dairy free ice-cream and mango sticky rice for dessert. Uses alternatives like vegan fish sauce and vegan laksa paste. Tofu is a protein option (no mock meats). Allows dogs in the patio.

name: The Black Groodle
address: 55 Mountain St, Ultimo, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Mediterranean, Salad bar, Take-out, European, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Small cafe setting with items such as middle eastern style salads, baked veggies and wraps. The food is prepared in the center of the cafe with the salads and veggie options in front of you so you could pick and choose what you'd like.

name: The Farm Wholefoods
address: Shop 3, 81 Macleay St, Potts Point, Sydney, New South Wales
open_hours: Now Open:                     Mon-Sat 7:00am-7:00pm, Sun 8:00am-7:00pm                  Closing soon.
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Western, Juice bar, Breakfast, Australian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Offers breakfast, lunch, smoothies, acai bowls, and sweet treats. Marks if a dish is vegetarian or vegan.

name: The Gantry
address: 11 Hickson Rd, Walsh Bay, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Gluten-free, Australian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Offers a vegetarian a-la-carte menu with two vegan dishes plus a vegan degustation menu which changes periodically.

name: The Gardens
address: 644 George St, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Raw, Salad bar, Honey, Breakfast, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Little cafe that serves breakfast and lunch. Porridge and fruit salad are both vegan, as are the almond pancakes if ordered without honey. Has a variety of salad options that could be made vegan as well. Note that the granola is not vegan as it is pre-mixed with Greek yoghurt.

name: The Malaya
address: 39 Lime St, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Ovo, Asian, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Offers South-East Asian cuisine. Has an a la carte menu with many vegan dishes and a vegetarian banquet which can easily be made vegan. Almost all the vegetarian options are vegan.

name: The Tea Room
address: Level 3 North End, Queen Victoria Building, 455 George St, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Ovo, British, Gluten-free, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Specialises in high teas. Can cater for vegan high teas and gluten free vegan high teas, with 24 hours notice.

name: Tung Tong Roong Thai
address: 1A Hillcrest Rd, Pennant Hills, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Ovo, Thai, Delivery, Take-out, Asian, Gluten-free, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Staff are knowledgeable of veganism and can make most dishes vegan on request, except for some curries and some pre-prepared entrees. Traditional Thai stir fries, rice and noodle dishes can be made vegan and served with mixed vegetables and tofu. All dishes can also be requested gluten free and most dishes can be requested without onion or garlic. Reservations for dinner are recommended.

name: Uliveto Cafe
address: 33 Bayswater Rd, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Mediterranean, Breakfast, Greek, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Mediterranean cafe offering bowls, salads, baked goods and breakfast dishes. Ask for the vegan options.

name: Untied
address: Level 4, 400 Barangaroo Ave, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Vegan-friendly, International, Beer/Wine, Gluten-free, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Rooftop bar in Barangaroo that has a number of marked vegan dishes including a taco, burger, sides and a dessert. Gluten free options also marked.

name: Vapiano
address: Corner of King St and York St, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. German-based restaurant chain & franchise operating branches globally, some with open kitchens where you see the cooks making the orders. Offers casual-style Italian food menu of pasta, pizza, salad, risotto, starter, and dessert selections. Vegan options are labeled with examples such as bruschetta, tomato soup, spaghetti or penne in tomato sauce, and ratatouille. Have vegan Parmesan and mozzarella options. Pizza dough confirmed vegan by Vapiano, Nov 2019.

name: Vermicelli
address: 191 Clarence St, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Fast food, Take-out, Asian, Vietnamese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Offers healthy Vietnamese street food, with vegan items on the menu. Includes rice paper rolls, pho and vermicelli bowls, using either tofu or vegetarian chicken (gluten), which is promoted on a sandwich-board outside. Staff understand vegan sensitivities and don't use fish/shrimp sauces in the vegan food.

name: The Vegan Cookie
address: Kings Cross Organic Food Market, Potts Point, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Vegan cookie stall operating from different several markets throughout the week. Check social media for locations and updates.

name: Vegan Street Eats
address: Sydney Area, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Vegan delivery/catering specializing in meals such as mousakka, cannelloni, lasagne, spaghetti bolognese, and other pasta dishes, along with a selection of desserts. Has a regular market stand at the Sydney Vegan Market and offers home delivery to Sydney and metropolitan suburbs.

name: Veganueasy
address: Sydney area, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Vegan meal kit company that delivers plant based recipes and ingredients to homes in the Sydney area to make it easier to learn new vegan recipes. You can order a one off box with 3 meals, or a weekly subscription.

name: Yogitown
address: 11/140 Lennox St (at  Lennox St), Sydney, New South Wales
description: Global clothing label inspired by yoga philosophy. Designs are hand-drawn and screen-printed in the Inner West of Sydney. All printing uses water-based inks and are 100% vegan. Garments are ethically manufactured and certified by the Fair Wear Foundation using only organic fibres.

name: Zesti Food
address: Market Vendor, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Specialises in vegan gyros / souvlaki. Regularly visits the Sydney vegan market.

name: Absurd Vird
address: Unit 19a 30-32 Beaconsfiled St, Alexandria, NSW 2015, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Offers vegan chick'n burgers and fried vegan chick'n.

name: All Things Acai
address: Sydney area, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Mobile vegan food vendor and caterer appearing at local markets. Menu includes acai bowls, smoothies and raw treats. Check its webpage for location updates & info.

name: Black Star Pastry
address: Level 2/500 George St, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Bakery cafe inside the Kinokuniya book store in the Galleries. Offers cakes, pastries, bread, and savory small bites. Has vegan labeled, with sample items such avocado on toast, mushroom potato rolls, salad, vegan chocolate cake and cupcakes, hot chocolate. Operates other branches.

name: CBD Cakes
address: MLC Centre, 2/108 King St, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Cake shop offering a vegan chocolate cake in either medium or large size. Offers delivery in the Sydney CBD and inner city suburbs.

name: CBD Natural Health
address: Level 1/343 George St, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Naturopathic medicine practice specialising in health and natural fertility.

name: Chatime
address: World Square Shopping Centre, 680 George St, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Bubble tea shop. Teas contain no gelatin or animal products apart from milk teas and the pudding toppings. Everything else is vegan.

name: Double Bay Farmers Market
address: Guilfoyle Park, Bay Street, Double Bay, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Open air farmers market.

name: Flying Pig Coffee
address: Sydney area, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Offers a coffee blend that the owner has developed specifically to work with plant milks.

name: Gelatissimo
address: Shop 2, 1-25 Harbour St, Darling Quarter, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Gelateria chain with vegan flavours that include: blood orange, green apple, lemon, mango, passionfruit, raspberry, strawberry, coconut, and 96% sugar free chocolate. Gelato and sorbet are made fresh in store, without artificial colours, or flavours. Waffle cones are naturally rolled, vegan friendly, and made with coconut oil (not palm oil). This company was founded in 2002 and operates outlets across Australia.

name: Gelatissimo - Circular Quay
address: Shop C2, Circular Quay Esplanade, Alfred St, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Gelateria chain with vegan flavours that include: blood orange, green apple, lemon, mango, passionfruit, raspberry, strawberry, coconut, and 96% sugar free chocolate. Gelato and sorbet are made fresh in store, without artificial colours, or flavours. Waffle cones are naturally rolled, vegan friendly, and made with coconut oil (not palm oil). This company was founded in 2002 and operates outlets across Australia.

name: Gelatissimo - The Rocks
address: 73 George St, The Rocks, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Gelateria chain with vegan flavours that include: blood orange, green apple, lemon, mango, passionfruit, raspberry, strawberry, coconut, and 96% sugar free chocolate. Gelato and sorbet are made fresh in store, without artificial colours, or flavours. Waffle cones are naturally rolled, vegan friendly, and made with coconut oil (not palm oil). This company was founded in 2002 and operates outlets across Australia.

name: Gelato Messina
address: Shop G-10, Gateway Plaza, 1 Macquarie Place, Circular Quay, Sydney, New South Wales
open_hours: Now Open:                     Mon-Thu 12:00pm-10:30pm, Fri 12:00pm-11:30pm, Sat 11:30am-11:30pm, Sun 11:30am-10:00pm
description: Gelato chain founded 2002 with its first outlet in Darlinghurst. The sorbet flavours and the cones are vegan and palm oil free.

name: Gourmand Providore
address: Kerruish Ave, Homebush West (at Sydney Markets), Sydney, New South Wales
description: Fruit and vegetable produce store, sells wholesale and to the public. Staff are trained to assist with menu and planning needs, ensuring that customers have continual access to seasonal produce, as it becomes available. All packaging material, including cartons, bubble wrap and styro-foam boxes, is recycled to minimise waste.

name: Kings Cross Farmers Market
address: Fitzroy Gardens, Macleay Street, Kings Cross, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Open air farmers market.

name: Max Brenner
address: Level 6, Westfield SC, Cnr Pitt St Mall & Market St, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Chocolate company operating dessert restaurants and chocolate shops internationally, with most of its outlets being in Australia. The restaurants offer labelled vegan menu items which are marked by a green leaf. These include a dark chocolate pizza, dip, lick (liquid chocolate), hot chocolate, frappe, and granita. Tea and coffee drinks available.

name: Metropole QVB
address: Kiosk 56, Ground Floor, 455 George St, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Cafe offering  a selection of vegan salads & pastries like pies, croissants, breads and more. Subject to availability.

name: Muffin Break
address: Central Plaza, 450 George St, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Serves meat, vegan options available Bakery cafe founded in Queensland AU in 1989 and now operates franchise outlets in a few countries. Quick service style. Each day will have at least 1 vegan muffin option, with varying flavors such as apple cinnamon, banana pecan, or blueberry. Also check for vegan 'meat' pie or flapjacks, and ask if can make you a vegan sandwich. Plant milk is available for drinks. Note that the chocolate powder contains milk.

name: Mum's Indian Kitchen
address: Sydney Area, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Meal delivery service offering home-style vegan Indian meals in Sydney and surrounding suburbs (Note: Uses ghee in some options, please confirm). Soybean yoghurt is also made in house. Meals are delivered on Mondays and Fridays between 6:30pm - 9:30pm.

name: Organic Foods and Farmers' Market
address: 5 Frenchs Forest Rd, Frenchs Forest, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Open air farmers' market with locations throughout Sydney and Sydney suburbs on different days of the week. See website for more locations and dates.

name: Paella Show Catering
address: 10 Carden Ave, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Spanish mobile catering in Sydney and surroundings. Specializes in paella and tapas, including vegan paella, tapas and salads. Customized vegan menu for weddings or any celebration.

name: St Dreux
address: 151 Clarence St, Sydney, New South Wales
description: Espresso bar offering a range of different coffee blends and single origins sourced from around the world. Offers alternative milks such as oat, soy, almond and macadamia. Has a range of vegan pastries such as vegan donuts.

open_hours: Now Open:                     Mon 9:00am-9:00pm, Tue-Fri 9:00am-6:30pm, Sat 9:00am-5:00pm, Sun 10:00am-4:00pm

cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg

Has vegan cheese and tofu rancheros filling. Black beans and guacamole vegan.

description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Offers a separate vegan menu which includes tacos, nachos, a fajita and a Texan salad. Part of a chain.

name: Employees Only
address: 9a Barrack St, Sydney, New South Wales
cuisine: Cuisine: Lacto, Beer/Wine, European, Australian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. New York-style cocktail bar and restaurant in Sydney’s CBD. Vegan marked on the menu include saffron risotto, crispy spiced tofu with eggplant, and char-grilled house garlic flatbread with smoked eggplant puree & hummus dip.

name: Fishbowl
address: 500 George St, Sydney, New South Wales

cuisine: Cuisine: Fast food, Take-out, Malaysian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, vegan options available. Food court Malaysian food. Variety of veggie curries served with rice. Owner confirmed that veggie dishes are also vegan. Has discounted food packs after 3pm.

name: Grill'd
address: Market St, Sydney, New South Wales

NOTE: Serves lamb.
